member.exception: If is not valid or is incorrect.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Footnotes.PerformPhase1
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 1.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Footnotes.PerformPhase2
member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 2.

member.summary: Specifies whether or not to execute Phase 3.

member.name: P:ScrewTurn.Wiki.Plugins.PluginPack.Footnotes.ExecutionPriority
